features: ❤【Upgraded Memory Foam Cushion Set-Cooling Gel Infused】FIRM Kmall office chair cushion and lumbar support pillow for car are made of premium memory foam formula with gel particles infused,NO ODOR and NEVER GO FLAT,firm and supportive, allowing for better posture when sitting down for long time. You can focus on the work task with our seat cushions for office chairs instead of paying more dollars and time on searching new ergonomic chairs!work from home essentials.

🌈【Coccyx Cushion for Tailbone Pain】We take ergonomic design as the concept of research and development, comprehensive care of the human tailbone and lumbar health. Kmall desk chair cushion adopt U-shaped design by alleviating pressure on the coccyx / tailbone and relieving sciatica, tailbone injury, Hip discomfort, back pain, herniated discs,etc.The sciatica pillow for sitting is good home&office accessories,Best back support and tailbone pain relief cushion.

💺【Office Chair Back Support Pillow】With contoured shape,the Lumbar support pillow for office chair alleviates pains from a greater surface area, including stiffness and tension in the upper, mid and lower back pain,muscle aches. Use our chair back pillow for office chair to create a supportive posture setup that cradles the lumbar area to provide long lasting comfort while driving your car or sitting in an office chair.

❤【Specially Designed for You-Sciatica Pain Relief Pillow】Non-slip bottom on the seat pad to ensure it stay firmly positioned in a seat. Two Adjustable Straps keeps the back support cushion in place and prevent the lumbar pillow from sliding down.

❤【Car Seat Cushions for Driving】Road trip essentials for adults! The breathable mesh cover of Kmall memory foam seat cushion and low back support pillow keeps air circulating and prevent discomfort from accumulated heat,keep your back cool on hot days or during long road drives,perfect size and thickness for everyday use.

❤【Portable Seat Cushion for Tailbone Pain Relief 】The portable handle on the seat pillow allows you to easily switch between home and office.Used together or separately, the ergonomic seat cushion for hip and back pain can be adapted to various types of seats,suitable for drivers, teachers, students, people with wheelchair, pregnant women, office workers, etc.ADD the Car seat cushion and chair lumbar support pillow to your cart now !

✅【Memory Foam Chair Cushion with Satisfaction Guaranteed】We guarantee all customers 100 Percent satisfied service. If you have any issues with our seat cushion for back pain &office chair back support , we are right here for you!

🎁 [ Best Gift for Family and Friends (Home Office Must Haves) ] This office accessory would be a sign of care and attention to family member, friend, office staff, driver, student, teacher or anybody who sits a lot.Kmall pressure relief seat cushion is a perfect gift idea or work from home gift.

✅ 【The Most Valued Investment】Not just chair pillow,can also be as gaming chair cusion,stadium cushion,driver seat cushion,wheelchair seat cushions,truck seat cushion,office chair pad,sciatica pillow,tailbone pillows,Excellent gifts for mothers day fathers day and friends, halloween decoration.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: We designed the seat cushion and lumbar support pillow specifically for your concerns. Quickly add it to your must-buy list and stay away from pain and have a permanent comfortable life from the moment you choose Kmall memory foam back support pillow and coccyx seat cushion. Features ✔✔✔Ergonomically Designed U-Shaped Cushion - relieve sciatica, disc herniation, tailbone injury, lumbar strain and other pains caused by prolonged sedentary. ✔✔✔Thick High-density Memory Foam Back Cushion - enough to support your tailbone, waist, lower back, spine and hips from those severe pressure points.Long service life for years and DOESN’T GO FLAT! ✔✔✔Multi-function - Best for Office Chair, Car seat, Computer Desk, WheelChair, Dining room, Living room, Driver, Truck Patio, Train & Airplane Travel, Couch, Recliner,etc. ✔✔✔mesh splicing cover - air circulation & breathable.Soft and caring support throughout the day!

SMART DETAILS Coccyx Seat Cushion With u-shaped design,This memory foam seat cushion helps suspend your tailbone, or coccyx off hard seating surfaces and provides optimal support for your legs, hips, butt and back. Premium Memory Foam Seat cushion for office chair and lumbar support pillow are made of 100% pure high-density premium durable memory foam which are NO ODOR and NEVER GO FLAT Lumbar Support Pillow for Chair Kmall driving back cushion adopt thicker, high density memory foam which will remember the shape of your body curve and cradle any part of your body that needs some relief or alignment so that you can sleep comfortably.

Easy to care With an invisible metal zipper, this outer cover is removable, durable, and easy to keep clean both by machine or by hands. PORTABLE HANDLE With the handle, you can easily switch between home office scenes, and take the chair cushion to go wherever you want to go.Perfect addition to your work from home accessories! STAYS IN PLACE Its texturized bottom stays securely in any seat. Perfect for your office or kitchen chairs, car, truck, wheelchair, computer desk chairs and couch BREATHABLE MESH COVER Durable mesh fabric cover can minimize heat buildup and provide superior air circulation and breathability to keep you cool while easily standing up to tough everyday use. METAL ZIPPER PORTABLE HANDLE NON-SLIP BOTTOM MESH COVER

SPECIALLY DESINGED FOR YOU Our chair cushion is designed to help relieve daily pain and pressure,not for special medical use.If your feel very uncomfort, please turn to your doctor. In order to improve sitting problem, we recommend you increase simple movements, such as walking answering calls, stretch your legs an arms very hour during working, do some prefer excerises,and whatever you like to invoid of sedentary. Your health is the Most Importent thing. Warm Note: Note 1: Our chair cushion is designed to help relieve daily pain and pressure,not for special medical use.If your feel very uncomfort, please turn to your doctor. Note 2: All the sizes are measured by hand,especially when you completely seated on the chair,there will be 1-2 cm difference.

CARE ABOUT YOUR LIFE! Take your comfort to the next level, anywhere you go. Turn any area into a relaxing space for sitting all day, everyday with your new chair pillow and back Cushion for office combo set. We hope all of you have health body and be happy eveyday. In order to improve sitting problem, we recommend you increase simple movements, such as walking answering calls, stretch your legs an arms very hour during working, do some prefer excerises,and whatever you like to invoid of sedentary. Your health is the Most Importent thing. IF YOU DON’T LIKE OUR SEAT CUSHION and LUMBAR SUPPURT - WE'LL RESOLVE ANY ISSUES. Kmall - CARE ABOUT YOUR LIFE!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love everything about this item. I am sitting on it right now as I type .... it has helped me relieved the pain off my back! I most definitely recommend this item if you are working from home or in a office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like everything about this item. I am sitting on it right now..it relieves my back of pain it is sturdy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Name is apt, comfy
reviews.reviewText: just right amount of support, and being movable is great to adjust easily. the elastic on the back part is going to stretch out quickly, but the seat is the important part and I am happy with it. My lower back is very happy since I started using it. Would recommend to anyone who has to sit in office chair for extended periods. Eager to try it out on long car trip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars comfort and support
reviews.reviewText: Relief of sciatic and back pain while sitting. The lumbar cushion was perfect for mid to low back pain. It provided all the support I needed. The seat cushion felt a little soft at first, but it also supported and relieved my pain. because it felt so right for me, I had my husband try it as he has basically the same issues, and he liked it as well. So we purchased a second one for him. We have been using them for almost a week and are very happy with our purchase. I would recommend them for the comfort and support and they are light in weight so you can take them with you for travel etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expected
reviews.reviewText: The lumbar support is amazing. The cushion for the seat is not good. It’s small so it does not cover most of the chair. I had to stop using it because it sits in the middle of legs and causes discomfort. If I were only rating the back support it would be a 5; because I am rating both the seat cushion brings the rating all the way down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It delivers the perfect comfort. Just make sure your chair is big enough because the back rest is thick but it seems like great quality so far. Fits perfectly on a basic office chair but any smaller chair and the back rest would be to thick. Had severe back pain and by the end of my work day I’m feeling much better than I was.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort for your back!
reviews.reviewText: I recently broke my leg and had to have surgery and I have to use a wheelchair around the house. But I noticed there is no support and my back was really hurting. These cushions provide the right amount of support and are vert comfortable. I would highly recommend these cushions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was expecting this to be a little thicker, BUT it's so comfortable . I work as a nurse and they wouldn't buy me new chairs, so do what you always do and DO IT YOURSELF. There isn't much writing on it besides the back part of the blue writing. It slips over the back of the chair and straps around the back. Very easy to install, if that's what you even call it. My back thanks you 🙂

reviews.reviewTitle: It is comfortable I hope it will help with my sciatica.
reviews.reviewText: I like I can sit comfortably on it I hope it is helping, I just got it couple of days ago

Instalé los cojines en mi silla para trabajo en casa y la hizo más cómoda, corrige la postura y disminuyó el cansancio. El asiento no es fijo, pero una vez que te sientas, no se desliza del asiento y el cojín de soporte lumbar tiene cintas que ajustan al ancho del respaldo y no permiten que se recorra.Por sus dimensiones, recomiendo su instalación en una silla con una superficie amplia y respaldo completo.Excelente!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 14, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Have been struggling sitting at my desk at home for some time now. Initially replaced the chair but that didn't do much good so invested in this lumbar support and have immediately noticed a difference in how supported my back feels. Very comfortable and supportive.
I love this Cushion and Lumbar Support Pillow. It helped my very much to manage my pains.
Realmente convierte cualquier silla en una silla ortopédica.
